description: Community Based Project for Rehabilitation of Salt-Affected and Waterlogged Lands (Bio Saline II)

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
This project is the second phase of “Pakistan Community Development Project for Rehabilitation of Saline and Waterlogged Land”, commonly known as “Bio Saline” which worked from January 1998 to June 2005 at three sites namely Shirkot, Pindhi Bhattian and Sahiwal of districts Hafizabad, Jhang and Sarghoda, Punjab. Bio Saline II will upscale the achievements of phase I by increasing depth of coverage in the same three districts by rehabilitating 100% of the affected land.

Project Outputs:
Output 1:	Mobilized communities that partner with the Government on agriculture and land rehabilitation schemes
Output 2:		Land rehabilitated and improved agricultural techniques promoted
Output 3:	Improved access to services, market, increased farm incomes and employment

Water-logged and saline lands in three districts of Punjab rehabilitated.
subproject.title: PRU-Bio Saline Phase II
